scripts.lint-shared: yarn workspace @mauriora/controller-sharepoint-list lint && yarn workspace @mauriora/utils-spfx-controls-react lint
scripts.clean-shared: yarn workspace @mauriora/controller-sharepoint-list clean && yarn workspace @mauriora/utils-spfx-controls-react clean
scripts.build-shared: yarn workspace @mauriora/controller-sharepoint-list build && yarn workspace @mauriora/utils-spfx-controls-react build
scripts.build: yarn workspace @mauriora/controller-sharepoint-list build && yarn workspace @mauriora/utils-spfx-controls-react build & yarn workspace @mauriora/webpart-example build
scripts.clean-all: yarn workspace @mauriora/webpart-example clean && yarn workspace @mauriora/controller-sharepoint-list clean && yarn workspace @mauriora/utils-spfx-controls-react clean
